Action.author: sykesm
Action.body: There's not enough information in this bug. Please add some details.

Action.author: jyellick
Action.body: ~aambati is this still an issue? More info was requested above.

Action.author: skarim
Action.body: The --cacount flag was never intended for this use case, the --cafiles flag is available for this scenario. Using the --cafiles one can specify the parent URL for each of the CA's.

Action.author: skarim
Action.body: After talking with Anil, we just need to document this behavior. The --cacount flag is not intended for complicated configurations. I am changing it from a bug to a task.
